doc:
Lewis Stone https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lewis_Stone 0 Lewis Shepard Stone (November 15, 1879 – September 12, 1953) was an American movie actor best known for his role as Judge James Hardy in the M-G-M Andy Hardy film series and as a studio contract player. He was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor in 1929 for The Patriot. He appeared in seven films with Greta Garbo. Lewis_Shepard_Stone ( November_15 , 1879 – September_12_,_1953 ) was an_American_movie_actor best_known for his_role as Judge_James_Hardy in the_M-G-M_Andy_Hardy_film_series and as a_studio_contract_player . He was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actor in 1929 for The_Patriot . He appeared in seven_films with Greta_Garbo .
